Messages.Author: Sebastian Wulff
Messages.Content: You will take part in the teaching evaluation at Faculty V in the summer semester 2024.  The survey is so short that it can be completed in less than 10 minutes.   The survey period runs until 15.07.24.    Please follow the link: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=STCXF

Messages.Author: Sebastian Wulff
Messages.Content: Visiting BWB Wastewater pumping station on Tuesday 18st June 14:15 o'clock! Adress Hohenzollerndamm 208, 10717 Berlin (near underground station "Spichernstr." U9

Messages.Author: Sebastian Wulff
Messages.Content: Dear all, We have the opportunity, on the 21st. May 2024 to visit a pump workshop in Berlin Kreuzberg. Further information will soon be available on the ISIS website. Best wishes Sebastian Wulff

Messages.Author: Sebastian Wulff
Messages.Content: We like to visit our laboratory tomorrow for the exercise, please wear closed shoes. Thank you!

Messages.Author: Sebastian Wulff
Messages.Content: There will be the possibility to visit the waterworks Friedrichshagen next monday. 29.04.2024 12-14 Uhr: Wasserwerk Friedrichshagen (meeting point: 11:45 a.m. in front of the plant premises) and monday 06.05. there will be a visit to the waste water treatment plant Waßmannsdorf 06.05.2024 12-14 Uhr: Klärwerk Waßmannsdorf (meeting point: 11:45 a.m. in front of the plant premises) in June we have a tour of BSH on the program  24.06.2024 10:30-12:30 Uhr: Bosch-Siemens-Haushaltsgeräte Please contact Markus Fischer (markus.fischer@tu-berlin.de) for booking and further information!
